thread.title: Production, casting heat up on Lee Daniels' TV pilot 'Star'
thread.title_full: Production, casting heat up on Lee Daniels' TV pilot 'Star'

title: Production, casting heat up on Lee Daniels' TV pilot 'Star'
text:
Paul A. Hebert Production, casting heat up on Lee Daniels' TV pilot 'Star' 
FILE - In this Aug. 6, 2015 file photo, Lee Daniels attends the 2015 Summer TCA - Fox All-Star Party at Soho House in Los Angeles. Production will begin in December 2015 on "Star," a drama pilot from "Empire" creator Daniels. Fox, which airs "Empire" and ordered the "Star" pilot, also said that an online casting search is under way for the drama. (Photo by Paul A. Hebert/Invision/AP, File) Posted: Tuesday, October 20, 2015 7:53 pm | Updated: 8:15 pm, Tue Oct 20, 2015. Production, casting heat up on Lee Daniels' TV pilot 'Star' Associated Press | 
LOS ANGELES (AP) â€” Production will begin in December on "Star," a drama pilot from "Empire" creator Lee Daniels. 
Fox, which airs "Empire" and ordered the "Star" pilot, also said that an online casting search is under way for the drama. 
Among the roles to be filled are those of three female artists trying to make it big in the music industry. 
"Star" will focus on the choices they face as they navigate what the network called the "cutthroat music scene." 
The "Star" pilot will be taped in Atlanta, Georgia, Fox said Tuesday. 
"Empire," also set in the recording business, proved an immediate hit when it debuted last season. 
___ 
Online: 
Fox casting search: http://foxedocs.com/uld
